title: Whats a Tank
body:
Wehy does it feel like tanks are non existance as you can tell im an ornn main either it be top or support but all i main is tanks now im not trash at the game but im not a god im just barely gold.

now my piont is there is wey to much damage in this game doesnt matter what you build there are 10X more damage items in the game then defensive ones and early game you just get shredded it feels like all damage is overtuned and true damage is completey broken tbh

my opinion is treu damage needs to be completely removed and armor and magic pen reworked shit is getting out of hand and some champs are just way way overtuned early game and late
